result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Fraud Against Financial Institution (Value does not Exceed $500)
Fraud Against Financial Institution (Value does not Exceed $500)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Isaac A. Lungelow

records.addlTxt:
1:30 PM cases 17CF1256, 17CF1250, 18CF240, 22CF432, 22CM505. Prosecuting Attorney Angela Lynn Beranek in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Isaac A. Lungelow appeared in custody, by video from Racine Youthful Offenders Correctional Facility.  Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard in court for Isaac A. Lungelow. Defendant waives right to personal appearance. State in compliance with victim notification requirements. State recites joint agreement. 

Revocation Packet received and reviewed by parties. No corrections or changes made on the record. Court orders on Count 4 in 17CF1256, Count 1 in 17CF1250, and Count 1 in 18CF240: 12 months jail with 241 days of jail credit on each count in each case. All concurrent to each other and concurrent to 22CF432. Any remaining court costs or restitution in these counts are to be converted to a civil judgment.

Defendant pleads No Contest in 22CF432:
Count 1: Fraud Against Financial Institution (Value Exceeds $500 but does not Exceed $10,000) Repeater, 
Count 4: Uttering a Forgery Repeater and 
Count 6 Identity Theft- Financial Gain Repeater
Defendant acknowledges prior convictions Defendant is advised of charges, maximum penalties, elements of the crime(s) and constitutional rights. 
Court accepts the pleas and finds the defendant guilty. 

Court orders in 22CF432: 5 years prison- 2 years Initial Confinement and 3 years Extended Supervision on each count concurrent. Also concurrent to 17CF1256, 17CF1250 & 18CF240.

Conditions of Extended Supervision:
No contact with T.H., R.H., R.A., V.A., L.G., C.C., A.C., S.S., Charter Bank and RCU
Communications with T.H. allowed for purposes of discussing child and their care.
Restitution in 22CF432 of $6,400 plus 10% surcharge
Restitution in 22CM505 of $639.90 plus 10% surcharge
$100 minimum restitution payments to start 3rd month after release from initial confinement.
Complete HSED
Any conditions, programming or treatment per the agent and follow through with recommendations. 
Provide DNA sample and pay surcharge. 
Court costs

Remaining charges in 22CF432 are dismissed and read in including 22CM505.
Court finds the defendant eligible for Challenge Incarceration Program and Substance Abuse Program.

9:58 AM cases 22CF432 & 22CM505. Defendant Isaac A. Lungelow in court, in custody.  Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard in court for Isaac A. Lungelow.  Attorney Trenton Piltz in court for State of Wisconsin.

Defendant waives right to a preliminary hearing in each file and Court accepts waiver.  

Refer to Br. 3 for scheduling.

Commissioner Wendy Sue Johnson for Branch 4 intake. 
Case called at 11:03 AM. Defendant Isaac Lungelow appears in custody via video conference from the Jail with Attorney Karl Schmidt.  ADA Afton Lewis appears in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defense waives reading of the complaint. Defendant updates address. 
Settlement Conference (by phone) with District Attorney's Office (715-839-4828) on 06/29/2022 at 3:15 PM. 
Hearing: 07/13/2022 at 9:30 AM.

Conditions:  
No contact with RCU banks, S.T. (victim)
**DEFENDANT REFUSES TO SIGN**

ADDRESS INFO for Isaac A. Lungelow
Current: 608 Wisconsin St. #1, Eau Claire, WI 54703 United States  (Effective: 06-17-2022)
Prior: 698 Baker Rd, Hudson, WI 54016
